0101111011000101 0010110011110000 0 -> sum: 1000101110110101, cout: 0

0011101010111101 0001100000101101 1 -> sum: 0101001011101011, cout: 0
0001000110110110 0101000111000011 1 -> sum: 0110001101111010, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
